entry.name: Logic ID
entry.description: ID of logic (non-battle) Lua script.

entry.name: Battle Goal ID
entry.description: Battle goal ID used to look up battle Lua script.

entry.name: Near Distance
entry.description: Distance considered to be close range by this NPC (for scripts).

entry.name: Middle Distance
entry.description: Distance considered to be medium range by this NPC (for scripts).

entry.name: Far Distance
entry.description: Distance considered to be long range by this NPC (for scripts).

entry.name: Out of Range Distance
entry.description: Distance beyond which the NPC will not attempt to fight.

entry.name: Retreat Time after NPC Wall Collision
entry.description: Retreat goal time when touching an 'enemy wall' that blocks the NPC's path.

entry.name: Goal ID - To Caution (Sound)
entry.description: Goal ID to use when NPC's AI enters the 'Caution' state. Requires a Caution Goal Action value of 4.

entry.name: Animation ID - Attack Cannot Move
entry.description: Animation to use if the NPC gets stuck on a destructible object.

entry.name: Goal ID - To Find (Sight)
entry.description: Goal ID to use when NPC's AI enters the 'Search' state. Requires a SearchGoalAction value of 4.

entry.name: Call Help - Action Animation ID
entry.description: Animation to play when responding to a call for help. Usually set to -1 for NPCs who can reply to calls for help, which I assume means no animation is played. Set to 0 for NPCs who ignore calls for help.

entry.name: Call Help - Call Action ID
entry.description: Animation to play when calling for help. Only used by Female Ghost (7300) and Male Ghost and summons (-1). I assume -1 means no animation is played. Set to 0 for all other NPCs.)

entry.name: Distance - Sight
entry.description: Distance of NPC eyesight (in meters).

entry.name: Distance - Listen
entry.description: Distance of NPC hearing (in meters).

entry.name: Listen - Sound Cut Distance
entry.description: Distance to reduce the size of the sound source. Sounds less than this distance will not be heard.

entry.name: Distance - Sense
entry.description: Distance of NPC sense (auto-detect).

entry.name: Retreat Home - Max Distance
entry.description: Absolute furthest the NPC can travel from their nest before retreating, in or out of battle. Usually set to about 50% more than BattleRetreatDistance.

entry.name: Retreat Home - Distance
entry.description: Furthest distance the NPC can travel from their nest before retreating in battle.

entry.name: Retreat Home - Battle Distance
entry.description: Target distance at which battle mode is triggered while the enemy is retreating.

entry.name: Non-Battle Act Life
entry.description: Lifespan of Acts outside of battle.

entry.name: Retreat Home - Look for Target Time
entry.description: Time that NPC will search for a lost target before retreating.

entry.name: Retreat Home - Look for Target Distance
entry.description: Distance that NPC will search for a lost target before retreating.

entry.name: Target - Sight Forget Time
entry.description: Time to forget about sighted targets.

entry.name: Target - Listen Forget Time
entry.description: Time to forget about heard targets.

entry.name: Battle - Start Distance
entry.description: Target distance at which battle mode is triggered.

entry.name: Call Help - My Peer ID
entry.description: Determines which calls for help this NPC will respond to (must match caller's HelpCallGroupID).

entry.name: Call Help - Call Peer ID
entry.description: HelpGroupID value of NPCs who should respond to calls for help by this NPC.

entry.name: Target System - Damage Effect Rate
entry.description: Get damage rate (%) for target system evaluation information

entry.name: Team Attack Effectivity
entry.description: Value from 0 to 100 that determines the number of simultaneous attacks made by this NPC's team. Higher values mean that less members of this team can participate in attacks at the same time.

entry.name: Sight - Angle X
entry.description: Angular width of sight field in degrees.

entry.name: Sight - Angle Y
entry.description: Angular height of sight field in degrees.

entry.name: Call Help - Valid Target Min Distance
entry.description: Minimum distance from AI target for help call to be made.

entry.name: Call Help - Valid Target Range
entry.description: Maximum distance of friend to receive help call from this NPC.

entry.name: Call Help - Forget Time by Arrival
entry.description: Time until call for help is forgotten by responder.

entry.name: Call Help - Min Wait Time
entry.description: Minumum time for response goal at first waiting goal.

entry.name: Call Help - Max Wait Time
entry.description: Maximum time for response goal at first waiting goal.

entry.name: Goal Action - To Caution (Sound)
entry.description: Type of action taken when AI enters the 'Caution' state.

entry.name: Goal Action - To Find (Sight)
entry.description: Type of action taken when AI enters the 'Search' state.

entry.name: Call Help - Reply Behavior Type
entry.description: Set to 0 for NPCs who do not reply to calls for help and 1 for NPCs who do.

entry.name: Ignore Navmesh
entry.description: If 1, this NPC will ignore navmesh when moving. True for Ghosts and enemies that don't move at all.

entry.name: Skip Arrival Visibility Check
entry.description: If enabled, arrival determination is performed even if the line of sight is not passed.

entry.name: Think Attribute - Do Admirer
entry.description: Thought attribute: when enabled, it plays the role of a wrap.

entry.name: Navigation - Edge
entry.description: If True, this NPC can enter navmesh regions flagged as 'edges'.

entry.name: Navigation - Large Space
entry.description: If True, this NPC can enter navmesh regions flagged as 'large spaces'.

entry.name: Navigation - Ladder
entry.description: If True, this NPC will use ladders.

entry.name: Navigation - Hole
entry.description: If True, this NPC can fall into navmesh holes.

entry.name: Navigation - Door
entry.description: If True, this NPC can go through doors (but not necessarily open closed doors).

entry.name: Navigation - Ignore Navmesh Wall
entry.description: If True, this NPC can go through walls (i.e. ignores navmesh walls).

entry.name: Listen - Angle X
entry.description: Angular width of hearing field in degrees.

entry.name: Listen - Angle Y
entry.description: Angular height of hearing field in degrees.
